page.title: 01Army and civilian life
page.content: Our grid is half civvy and half army. The army people have to rent their houses from the army.The others rent or buy them from the council,and some live on private estates.{The Queen visited {THE UNIVERSITY OF ESSEX, some people from the schools in our grid went to see her.She stopped there on her way to the new hospital to open it.The Queen unveiled a plaque.Schools in our area had places reserved for them. Schools in the area went to see{The Staffordshire {Regiment Trooping the Colour}for a farewell to Colchester. They will be going to Germany in January.The band played some nice tunes.The band were dressed in red and black.Two guards were dressed in black with a white apron.They were holding an axe with a black handle and a silver top.The guards were all in step with the band.
